155617.鍛冶とは 素材となる地金をたたいて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\n<br:
Blacksmithing is the process of creating a desired item by striking the metal used as a material... As you strike the metal, your
forge level will increase... Aim for the green success zone on the gauge... The quality of the finished product depends on
the accuracy of the... Blacksmithing commands require concentration... If you lose your concentration, you won't be able to execute
them, so pace yourself and choose your commands... Bullion has a temperature, and when the temperature drops, it's hard to
increase the forgeability... If the metal gets too cold, the session is over... If the game is interrupted by a communication error
while you're blacksmithing, your ticket will be lost.

155618.鍛冶の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n熱くなった地金をたたくと 鍛え度メーター:
Here's an explanation of how to play blacksmithing! When you tap the hot metal, the forge meter will go up... Adjust the
forge meter so that it is within the green success zone... When all your gauges are within the green success zone, you can use
the "Finish" command. If the temperature of the metal you're using as material drops, it will be difficult to increase the
forgeability... Keep an eye on the temperature of the metal and your concentration as you work towards completion!

155619.鍛冶設備がある。\n武器鍛冶部 防具鍛冶部 道具鍛冶部 いずれかの\n部員であれ:
It's a smithing faility. If you're a member
of the Weaponsmith, Armormith, or Toolsmith
divisions, you can create items here.

When selecting a recipe with materials you don't have on hand, you have the option of using materials from either storage.

155678.木工とは 素材となる木材を彫って\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\n<br>:
Woodworking is the process of carving a piece of wood to make a desired item. As the wood is carved, it is gradually removed and shaped
to follow the success line. The quality of the finished product depends on the accuracy of the... It takes concentration to execute
woodworking commands... If you lose your concentration, you won't be able to do it, so pace yourself and choose your commands...
Carve from the bottom of the grid to the top... If you're not following the grain of the wood, you'll only be able to carve a
small amount, so rotate the workbench to adjust the direction... If the game is interrupted by a communication error while
you are woodworking, your ticket will be lost.

155679.木工の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n木材を彫って 成功ラインに沿うように\n:
Here are some instructions on how to play with wood! Carve a piece of wood and shape it along the success line... When all the
squares are aligned with the success line, use the "Finish" command to complete your work. If the direction of the wood grain and
the direction of the carving are correct, you can carve a lot... If the direction of the grain and the direction of the carving are
not aligned, only a little will be cut. Rotate the workbench to change the direction of the wood grain, and make any necessary
adjustments.

155680.木工設備がある。\n木工部員であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
It's a woodworking facility.
If you are a woodworker, you can craft items
here.

155705.<color_yellow>\n「どうぐかばん」だけでなく 「預かり所」と\n「:

select a recipe for which you don't have the necessary materials, you can use the materials items in the Storage Area and Roof
Storage...

155739.<%sL_SKILL_NAME>とは <%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME>の:
<%sL_SKILL_NAME> is a roulette on the cover of <%sL_TOOL_BASE_NAME> that can be used to add special alchemical effects to
equipment... However, the quality of the equipment to which the alchemical effect can be applied will depend on its quality.★It's the one with the...★You can add as many alchemical effects as you want... Once you've chosen the equipment you want to alchemize and the alchemical effect
you want to apply, spin the roulette needle... If the needle stops in the blue area, you've achieved alchemy! If the needle
stops in the gray area, you've lost your alchemy. If you fail, you'll get a much weaker alchemy effect than the one you
chose... To increase the chance of alchemy success, use special skills... You can use alchemy skills as long as you have the
concentration. In addition, if the game is interrupted by a communication error while you're smelting, your ticket will be lost.

155740.<%sL_SKILL_NAME>の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nルーレットの:
Here's an explanation of how to play <%sL_SKILL_NAME>! If you spin the roulette needle and the needle stops in the blue area,
your smelting succeeds! If the needle stops in the gray area, it's a smelting failure... Before spinning the roulette needle, you need
to use your concentration to use various skills to make your smelting successful. If you lose your concentration, you can't use
any of them. "Start" to turn the roulette needle, and leave the rest to luck. Good luck and good luck to you!

155799.<speed=0>\n<pc>は いま作っている\n<%sL_RECIPE>を:
<speed=0>

<%sL_RECIPE> they were working on.

155800.さいほうとは 素材となる布を ぬいあわせて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
Sewing is the process of stitching various fabrics together to make a variety of items.
Cut pieces of fabric are stitched together, and your goal is to align them with the success lines.
The quality of the finished item depends on how precise you are with lining up with these success lines.
Executing commands costs Focus, so running out means you won't be able to use any. Choose your commands carefully!
The power of your sewing level changes with each turn, so pay attention to the icon at the top of the sewing screen.
Red means a strong sewing power, green means normal, and blue means weak. This affects how substantial your stitching is.
Be sure to adjust your commands accordingly depending on what your current sewing power level is.
Note that if the game is interrupted via communication error during sewing, your ticket will be lost. Please be careful.

155801.さいほうの遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nカットされた布を ぬいあわせて\n成:
This will explain how to sew!
Stitch the cut pieces of fabric together, and try your best to align them against the dotted success lines.
When all squares match the success lines, use the "Finish" command to complete your item!
Each time you stitch, your sewing power changes. Keep an eye on the top of the sewing screen to see your current power.
Red means strong, green means normal, and blue means weak. This affects how substantial your next stitch will be.
Adjust your commands accordingly and be mindful of your Focus to aim for a perfection!

155802.さいほう設備がある。\nさいほう部員であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
There is a Sewing Facility, where you can make

Department.

155860.<speed=0>\n<pc>は いま作っている\n<%sL_RECIPE>を:
<speed=0>

<%sL_RECIPE> they were working on.

155861.調理とは フライパンにのせた 具材を焼いて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
Cooking is when you cook the ingredients on the pan to make the desired item... The more ingredients you cook, the more the cook meter
will rise. When the meter is full, the ingredients are ready to eat... All ingredients are ready to eat. The quality of
the final product is determined by the accuracy of this... It takes concentration to execute the cooking commands. If you lose
concentration, you won't be able to execute them, so pace yourself and choose your commands... The closer the ingredients are to
the center of the pan, the higher the browning meter will be, so adjust the position of the ingredients... If the game is
interrupted by a communication error while you are cooking, you will lose your ticket...

155862.調理の遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\n毎ターン 具材を焼く度に\n各具材の 焼:
This will explain Cooking!
As you cook each ingredient, its cooked meter will rise. Do your best to try and fill this meter.
Ingredients that have a full meter are fully cooked and ready to eat.
When all ingredients are fully cooked, use the "Finish" command to finish cooking!
If an ingredient that is fully cooked has its meter filled again, it will burn, so be careful not to overcook your ingredients.
The closer an ingredient is to the center of the frying pan, the more its cooked meter will rise when it is cooked.
Be mindful of your Focus as you cook as you aim to be a top chef!

155863.調理設備がある。\n調理部員であれば\nここで アイテムが作れそうだ。:
It's a cooking facility.
If you're a cook, you can craft items here.

has already been fixed.

succeed or fail, so feel free to try it out... You can learn how to make items by clicking on the "Show description" command...
If you change the club you belong to, you can practice with other clubs' equipment... You can practice as much as you want and improve
your skills...
